website_summaries.verdict: A well-crafted wooden set that, while very small, is still fun to play with on a tabletop or other raised surface.
pros: Well designed and crafted set with 10 wooden pins and 3 bowling balls
Very colorful, with both faces and numbers on the pins
Comes with a burlap storage sack
cons: The overall set is a lot smaller than some buyers expected
The wooden pins are also very hard, and some parents may see them as potential projectiles

customer_reviews.title: Super small but cute.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more closely - this is a SUPER SMALL set. It's about the size of an adult hand and it's hard for little hands to navigate. I bought it for my son and I to "bowl" in the kitchen and we ended up having to use it on a table and then it's just a pain to pick up all over the place. It's super cute, just pay attention to what you are buying size wize. I wish I had!
customer_reviews.author: Shannizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great for my baby
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved carrying around and playing with the little pins! She thought it was so fun and when she was to little to bowl it was easy for her to hold onto and safe because she couldn’t swallow or bite a piece off
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Love this! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable . My kids love this. The size is great for table top bowling at the dining room table. It’s a great way to learn colors and numbers too. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: GreatLife Bowling set for kids
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my grandson's 3rd birthday which is in the end July. He hasn't played with it yet. A little smaller than anticipated. But probably good for little hands. Quality solid wood construction. Great paint job on the pins, which actually stay put, when you stand them up. Great customer service, if needed. Cute toy for toddlers!!
customer_reviews.author: Odakee

customer_reviews.title: Only 5 stars because 6 wasn't an option!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my niece and they came 2 days later, just as promised. She is 18 months old and absolutely loves them! Perfect size to play on coffee table. She can practice her balance and hand/eye coordination. Plus, is there really any sound better than baby giggles...? Nope, there isn't. And with these you get all 3!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor play
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson, who is nearly 5. He played with it for hours, saying it was the best present ever! It’s great for indoor play and is well made. I like that the set is made out of wood and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Driven mad

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sweet and a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for my two year old son, who loves to roll balls into things to knock them down. He really adores this set; he experiments with different ways to set up the pins and has fairly good aim with knocking them down. The pins are adorable and fun, and everything is a nice quality. After months of frequent use I haven't seen any paint chips or dents.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Foster

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: So...... these are SUPER TINY!!!! I don't know if I would recommend these for any child really I have a three-year-old and they're super hard and super tiny for him. A baby I can imagine them being even more dangerous. These are more like a keepsake and not a functional toy for a child. So definitely buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Toddlers or Children
customer_reviews.text: The set is cute, but the little balls are so light that children cannot roll and knock down the pins . They can be thrown way to easy and since being made of wood, hard and destructive.
customer_reviews.author: MSgt Michael Gonzales, Ret.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. These are very small! Not at all what I expected. My child won’t play with these - has no interest bc of how small they are. Although this product is not what I expected, the company quickly refunded me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids is really into dolls and wanted a doll bowling set - we couldn't really find one at a good price so we started looking for the pieces of one and came across these - and man are we glad we did. They are solid wood, are painted very well, are a perfect size for an 18in doll and look great. Glad we made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ManBehindTheCurtain

customer_reviews.title: Ok toddler toy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible packaging. Box feel apart as my niece was opening it. The pin/balls don’t fit in bag provided. However they are adorable and made a cool noise being wood when hit down. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Expected this item to be bigger. The pins are cute however the whole bowling set is small came in a box size 4x4 inches big so there you are.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kornilieff

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying, can get a better set else where for less
customer_reviews.author: Code

customer_reviews.title: Party favor
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! The kids love it. Very cute and colorful. Used it as a party favor. It was a hit!! Received a box that was opened and broken. Seller sent me another one. Superb customers service !
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute colors and numbers animal wooden bowling set and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Quality game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table top game. Is is sturdy and well made. I like the fact that it comes with 3 balls in case we lose one. I would have given it 5 stars if the canvas bag was bigger. It's too small to fit all the pins and balls easily. So, I pack the pins back in the box and put the balls in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy DeMario

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bowling set!
customer_reviews.text: This is great in my condo for my granddaughter. Not too big and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: CattnippRN

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery not what I expected in size. Far from it.
customer_reviews.text: Caution. The set is a mini. Like a mantle piece decor. Not a real size toy.
customer_reviews.author: Earlytimes

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: looks like a nice little gift for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.author: Michele DeMike

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This was not at all what I expected, but after communicating with customer service we were able to resolve the issue. This is one of the best displays of customer service that I have received in years! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: djgflowers

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This set is a joke. $17 for a MINIATURE bowling set. My son was so unhappy. Sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old and she loves to set them up and knock them over, make the animal noises, hide and seek the pieces, and throw the balls around. This is a high quality, interactive play set that keeps both of us entertained! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Double check price before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Nice gift for kids, just smaller looking than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Silvsabby

customer_reviews.title: 4 yr old nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a very playful 4 yr old. It is good for an adult to be with kid even though it is played indoors. Opened package today. Hopefully, interest will last for a while. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Janki Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but a lot smaller than what I anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rutland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a gift but I believe it will be great
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Poppino

customer_reviews.title: a lot smaller than i expected. it was neat ...
customer_reviews.text: a lot smaller than i expected. it was neat to see the baby carefully stand up the pins though.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Terin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I teach Elementary Spanish and enjoy incorporating games into the curriculum. This game set is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot smaller than I anticipated but are really cute
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Frumoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: totally too small for toys and too hard for small children
customer_reviews.author: esingleton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute mini pins
customer_reviews.text: Super cute mini pins. I used them for a putting contest at a golf tournament. They really added a little fun and creativity to our event.
customer_reviews.author: KDK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent time. Beautifully crafted pieces...whimsical designs. My kids love playing with this set! I'm happy this is the one I chose to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good for children
customer_reviews.text: I brought this with a numerical train for my nephew. He is enjoying both of these. The only reason I am giving 4star is it is lil smaller than aspected. Both the broduct came in good condition in well packed form.
customer_reviews.author: NabbyGurl

customer_reviews.title: This set is even more adorable than the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: This set is even more adorable than the picture shows. It's provided hours of entertainment for my 3-year-old, who loves the fact that each pin has a number on it. The set comes with a little burlap bag in all the pieces fit nicely without having to carefully pack them. I'm planning on purchasing more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Clark

product_meta.title: AGREATLIFE Wooden Bowling Game Set for Kids - Mini - Pins Measure 4 Inches | 10.16 cm and Balls Measurement 1.6 Inches | 4.06 cm
feature_bullets: 🎳 TOP TABLE GAMES MINI BOWLING - The 3 bowling balls and bowling 10 pins are made from high quality solid wood with non-toxic odorless paint finishes making them very safe for your playful and curious toddlers. Each pin measures 4 x 1.3 inches and each ball is at 1.6 inches in diameter, perfectly sized for little hands.

🎳 FOR AGES 3, 4, 5 AND UP - It’s the perfect indoor bowling set for toddlers and preschoolers! It helps develop their hand-eye coordination, fine motor and gross motor skills and promotes better communication and counting skills, too.

🎳 LIGHTWEIGHT BUT STURDY - This kids bowling set is lightweight, making them easy for your toddlers. The bowling pin set is sturdy enough to sit flat on any surfaces and withstand all the blows. They’re so easy to set up and maneuver, and so much fun to knock down!

🎳 VERSATILE BOWLING TOYS - Can be played on tabletop, desktop, indoor, lawn or outdoor. Play this bowling game set at a carnival themed party! It helps develop their hand-eye coordination, fine motor and gross motor skills and promotes better communication, color recognition and counting skills, too.

🎳 WE HAVE YOUR BACK - We are committed to give you a fun and exciting play time. If you have any problems with our toys or are not satisfied with its operation we will be happy to grant you a full refund or ship you a replacement.
